comment.text: The "ApplicationsDeletedSuccessfully" translation key is used to display a success message when applications are deleted successfully in an OAuth settings context. This message appears as part of a delete dialog and a toast notification when the delete process completes without errors.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Հավելվածը հաջողությամբ միացված է" translates to "The application has successfully connected." This does not accurately convey the meaning of "Applications deleted successfully". It implies a connection, not a deletion.

The Korean translation '애플리케이션이 삭제되었습니다' is a passive voice construction that translates to 'Applications have been deleted'. While technically correct, it doesn't perfectly capture the active and affirmative tone of 'Applications deleted successfully'. A more direct translation conveying success would be better.

The translation 'ຄຳ ຮ້ອງ ຖືກ ລົບ ອອກ ຢ່າງ ສົມບູນ ແລ້ວ' while conveying the general meaning, is a bit verbose and not the most natural phrasing. A more direct translation of 'Applications deleted successfully' would be 'ຄໍາຮ້ອງຖືກລົບແລ້ວ' or 'ຄໍາຮ້ອງລົບອອກແລ້ວ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄໍາຮ້ອງຖືກລົບແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Aplicații au fost șterse cu succes' is grammatically correct, but slightly passive. A more natural phrasing would be in the active voice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aplicațiile au fost șterse cu succes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'යෙදුම් සාර්ථකව මකන ලදි.' while understandable, isn't the most natural or precise translation of 'Applications deleted successfully'. A more accurate and common phrasing would emphasize the action completed by a subject.

The Slovenian translation "Aplikacije uspešno izbrisane" is passive voice. While grammatically correct, a more natural and active voice construction would be preferred for this context.  "Uspešno izbrisane aplikacije" would be more common.

The translation 'Застосунки успішно видалено' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Applications deleted successfully'. 'Застосунки' is a diminutive and somewhat informal term for 'applications'. While understandable, it might not be suitable for all contexts, especially if a more formal tone is desired.
While technically correct, 'Застосунки' is less commonly used than 'Заявки' when referring to applications in a technical context. Although not a misspelling, it impacts the professional tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use 'Заявки' instead of 'Застосунки' for a more standard and formal feel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "多个应用已删除" (Duō gè yìngyòng yǐ shānchú) translates to "Multiple applications have been deleted." While not entirely wrong, it's less precise than the English "Applications deleted successfully." The English conveys a sense of completion and success, which isn't explicitly present in the Chinese translation. "多个" (multiple) isn't strictly necessary and adds slight awkwardness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 应用已成功删除 (Yìngyòng yǐ chénggōng shānchú) - "Applications have been successfully deleted" or simply 应用已删除 (Yìngyòng yǐ shānchú) - "Applications have been deleted".
